cleaned_text: In a word, yes! According to Astin and other researchers from the Harvard Medical School and the California Pacific Medical Center: "There is now considerable evidence that an array of mind-body therapies can be used as effective adjuncts to conventional medical treatment for a number of common clinical conditions."
